title: Are there two Lady Gagas? If so, who is the second Lady Gaga and how does she differ from the first? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, there aren't two Lady Gagas. You must have been confused with her on stage personas and recent unveiling of her alter-ego Jo Calderone. Lady Gaga aka Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta are one and the same, and they exist in only one piece in the entire world, however, most of the times she present herself in unique looks or style which often confuses people. This is Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta   This is Lady Gaga (Typical GAGA)   This is Jo Calderone (An Alter-ego)    Jo Calderone is a fictional male alter-ego to Lady Gaga  "Beginning as an invention of my mind, Jo Calderone was created with Nick Knightas a mischievous experiment." V Magazine
